title: Create an SLO Mapping type for use with Polaris SLO Cloud

name.description: The name of the SLO Mapping type.
name.x-prompt: What class name would you like to use for the SLO Mapping type class? 'SloMapping' will be appended automatically.

project.description: The name of the publishable library project, to which the SLO Mapping type should be added.
project.x-prompt: To which project should the SLO Mapping type be added? This must be a publishable library project.

directory.description: The directory within the project's src folder, where the SLO Mapping type should be created.

createLibProject.description: Create a publishable library project for the SLO Mapping type.

importPath.description: The import path of the publishable library, e.g., '@my-org/my-lib' (only used and required if --createLibProject is true).
